source.25ca999d: ### Basic Visualization by using MATPLOTLIB Library Matplot is a python library that help us to plot data. The easiest and most basic plots are line, scatter and histogram plots. * Line plot is better when x axis is time. * Scatter is better when there is correlation between two variables * Histogram is better when we need to see distribution of numerical data. * Customization: Colors,labels,thickness of line, title, opacity, grid, figsize, ticks of axis and linestyle
